import "../App.css" import React from "react"; import { NavLink , Link} from "react-router-dom"; import HomeImg from "./HomeImg1.png"; import {allVideos} from "../Database/allVideos" import { displayVideos } from "../Database/displayVideos"; import searchIcon from "./search.svg"; const Home = () => { const [isDesktop, setDesktop] = React.useState(window.innerWidth > 720); const updateMedia = () => { setDesktop(window.innerWidth > 620); }; React.useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("resize", updateMedia); return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", updateMedia); }); return <>
